trigger.send:
local xpCurrent = %3 local xpOld = tonumber(GetVariable("xpOld")) local xpDiff = xpCurrent - xpOld
if xpDiff ~= 0 then if xpOld == -1 then Note ('initializing xp') else Note ('You have gained xp: ' .. xpDiff) SetStatus ("You have gained xp: ", xpDiff) end
SetVariable("xpOld", xpCurrent) end

alias.send:
local xpOld = tonumber(GetVariable("xpOld"))
if xpOld ~= -1 then local t = GetWorld ("xpHour") -- get "xpHour" world
SetVariable ("xpHourRoutine", 1) SetVariable ("xpAccum", 0) EnableTimer ("xpHour_Timer", true) Note ('xpHour Timer on')
local xpAccum = tonumber(GetVariable("xpAccum"))
xpHourOpened = world.Open ("worlds\\\\xpHour.MCL") if xpHourOpened == true then t:DeleteOutput() t:Note ('Timer Started') t:ColourNote ( "#C0C0C0", "black", "Accumulated xp: ", "cyan", "black", xpAccum) else Note ("XP Tracking Window Did Not Load") end
SWmudOpened = world.Open ("worlds\\\\SWmud.MCL") -- puts focus back on main window else Note ('Initialize xp first: Get mud to output standard prompt') end

local t = GetWorld ("xpHour") -- get "xpHour" world local xpAccum = tonumber(GetVariable("xpAccum"))
SetVariable ("xpHourRoutine", 0) EnableTimer ("xpHour_Timer", false) Note ('xpHour Timer off')
t:DeleteOutput() t:Note ('Timer Aborted') t:ColourNote ( "#C0C0C0", "black", "Accumulated xp: ", "cyan", "black", xpAccum)

muclient.script:
function OnPluginInstall (s)
local t = GetWorld ("xpHour") -- get "xpHour" world
SetVariable("xpOld", -1) SetVariable("xpHourRoutine", 0) SetVariable("xpAccum", 0)
xpHourOpened = world.Open ("worlds\\\\xpHour.MCL") SWmudOpened = world.Open ("worlds\\\\SWmud.MCL") -- puts focus back on main window
if xpHourOpened == true then t:DeleteOutput() t:Note ('XP_Gained Plugin installed') else Note ("XP Tracking Window Did Not Load") end
end -- function OnPluginInstall
